name: Acres of Dices
description:
Description

Small puzzle-chill game made during the GMTK 2022 in 48 hours.

Gameplay

No rush, take a breath.. and roll a dice in peaceful gardens.. 

Your way will be made with  using your top value.  

Know Issues

The level 8 might have a gate not working properly, which makes the level really easy to complete :)

Will be fix on post jam update!

Commands

R to Restart the level

M to Mute
